title: Granados deuotion Exactly teaching how a man may truely dedicate and deuote himselfe vnto God: and so become his acceptable votary. Written in Spanish, by the learned and reuerend diuine F. Lewes of Granada. Since translated into Latine, Italian and French. And now perused, and englished, by Francis Meres, Master of Artes, & student in diuinity.
author: Luis, de Granada, 1504-1588.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by E. Allde. for Cuthbert Burby, and are to be sold at his shop at the Royall Exchange,
